ValidationRule.description: Timeline is required for Coaching Request to move the status from define to design.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName ='Individual_Coaching', RecordType.DeveloperName ='Group_Coaching' ) , ISCHANGED(Product_Request_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Product_Request_Status__c),'Define'), ISPICKVAL(Product_Request_Status__c, 'Design'), ISBLANK(TEXT(Timeline__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “Timeline” is required to update the Product Request Status.
